def_cn: (加在计量单位之前)表示“兆”，“百万”
def_en: Mega- is added to nouns that refer to units of measurement in order to form other nouns referring to units that are a million times bigger.

def_cn: (与名词、形容词构成合成词，强调大小、性质或重要性)
def_en: Mega- combines with nouns and adjectives in order to emphasize the size, quality, or importance of something.
